//React import React, {Component} from 'react' //Style import '../style/inscription.css' class Inscription extends Component { state = { formulaire : { username : '', firstname : '', lastname : '', gender : '', email : '', mailValidation : '', password : '', password_confirm : '' } } handleChange = (event) => { const formulaire = {...this.state.formulaire} console.log(formulaire) const list= Object.keys(formulaire) console.log(list) const targetId = event.target.id for (let i = 0; i < list.length; i++) { if (list[i] == targetId) { formulaire[targetId] = event.target.value } } this.setState({formulaire}) } render () { return (

Inscription

) } } export default Inscription
